Hospital affiliations Mater Hospital , Mpishah Hospital, Agha Khan hospital
Consultation Fee Ksh 5000
Poffesional profile Dr.Alphonce Otieno studied medicine at the university of Naiorobi, and graduated in 2000 with MBChB. He also undertook a bachelor of science research degree in patients with diabetes and cardiovascular diseases Dr.Alphonce has performed his general cardiology training at several teaching hospitals in London UK and subspeciality training in coronary intervention at Agha Khan Hospital college, and Kenyatta Hospital He is an experienced interventionist routinely performing complex
